summary: I WENT TO WARM UP MY FORD FOCUS ZX3 AS USUAL ON TUESDAY MORNING, BUT WHEN I TURNED ON THE HEATER/DEFOROSTER NOTHING HAPPENED. I THEN GOT IT SERVICED AND WAS TOLD THAT THE HEATER/DEFROSTER SWITCH HAD MELTED.  MY CONCERN IS THAT THERE COULD OF BEEN/ STILL CAN BE A FIRE IF THE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM IS FAULTY ENOUGH TO MELT THE SWITCH.
